line.originaltext: 24 jalapeno peppers
1 pound sausage
2 cups all-purpose baking mix
1 (16 ounce) package Cheddar cheese, shredded
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 (16 ounce) package Cheddar cheese, shredded")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon garlic salt
1 (16 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cubed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "1 (16 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cubed")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
line.annotation: set(t0,"Preheat to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)")

line.originaltext: Lightly grease a medium baking sheet.
Lightly grease a medium baking sheet.
Cut a slit in each jalapeno pepper.
line.annotation: cut(ing0, , ing7, "slitted jalapenos", "cut slit in each pepper")

line.originaltext: Remove and discard seeds and pulp.
line.annotation: do(ing7, , ing13, "seedless slitted jalapenos", "Remove and discard seeds and pulp")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl, mix sausage, baking mix, Cheddar cheese, crushed red pepper, and garlic salt.
In a medium bowl, mix sausage, baking mix, Cheddar cheese, crushed red pepper, and garlic salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing8, "sausage stuff", "")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl, mix sausage, baking mix, Cheddar cheese, crushed red pepper, and garlic salt.
Stuff jalapenos with the Monterey Jack cheese cubes.
line.annotation: combine({ing6, ing13}, ing10, "cheesy jalapenos", "stuff jalapenos with cheese cubes")

line.originaltext: Shape sausage mixture around the jalapenos to form balls.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing9}, ing11, "sausage jalapeno balls", "shape sausage stuff around the jalapenos to form balls")

line.originaltext: Arrange jalapeno balls on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned.
line.annotation: cook(ing11, t0, ing12, "cooked jalapeno sausage balls", "Bake 25 minutes, until lightly browned")

line.originaltext: Bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned.
